title: Astrology Guidance & Life Direction
tagline: Trusted Insights from 25+ Years Experienced Astrologers
description: This service connects you with highly experienced astrologers who provide ethical, practical guidance for clarity in career, relationships, and life decisions.
workWithMe: Consultations focus on awareness, timing, and personal growth rather than fear-based predictions. Guidance is grounded, thoughtful, and personalized.

faqs.title: Who will I be consulting with?
faqs.content: You’ll be connected with an astrologer with 25+ years of experience.

faqs.title: Is this predictive or guidance-based?
faqs.content: The focus is on guidance, awareness, and timing.

faqs.title: Is there a free consultation?
faqs.content: Initial clarity calls may be offered based on availability.

faqs.title: How do I book a session?
faqs.content: After a discovery call, you’ll receive a booking link to proceed.
